attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I Kirsty McGivern Wish to Fight agaisnt weapon crime. as a teenager myself I fear this city and its streets. I wish for teenagers like myself to fight back and help bring harsher punishment in to order.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
